items.sentence: Mary was the only girl at the party wearing a dress.
I'm clearly not needed here anymore, so I'm leaving.
Do you have an extra frying pan that I could borrow?
On a day like this, it's very easy to get sunburned.
You can put lipstick on a pig, but it's still a pig.
I knew there was no point in trying to convince Tom.
The first time I tried to do that, I couldn't do it.
I drank more than I should've at last night's party.
I'm sure that Tom won't be the first one to do that.
I probably won't be able to convince Tom to do that.
